mapper.select: SELECT pav.*,pa.name FROM pms_product_attribute_value pav LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute pa ON pa.id=pav.product_attribute_id WHERE pav.product_id=#{id} AND pa.type=1

SELECT pa.* FROM pms_product_attribute pa where pa.product_attribute_category_id = ( select pa.product_attribute_category_id from pms_product_attribute_value pav LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute pa ON pa.id=pav.product_attribute_id WHERE pav.product_id=#{id} AND pa.type=0 LIMIT 1 ) AND pa.type = 0 order by pa.sort desc
